findings.title: Deployer cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The deployer of the contract has the capability to mint tokens even after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Contract has public burn function
findings.description: The contract contains a publicly accessible burn function.

findings.title: Deployer cannot pause contract
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to pause the contract.

findings.title: Deployer cannot block user
findings.description: The deployer does not have the capability to block a user.
